Text: O Jihofa, uwe̩ fʼejefu-mi tu me̩, e̩ la ma mi!
Uwe̩ chema uguane̩-mi kpai ukwane̩-mi;
Uwe̩ do̩mo̩ afe̩ ikpa kʼu nale kpai edachi-mi,
O̩la le ki wʼef alu-mi,
Uwe̩ fʼo̩na kpanyu mi tʼo̩gba tʼubi,
E̩wñ ema abe̩le̩ chʼe̩wñ aye tʼumi le;
Ugbo nanyi kʼu kwo bʼAfu-we̩ te̩?
Iche̩wñ kʼu nate̩gu nyʼefojale, uwe̩ dʼo̩mo̩!
Iche̩wñ kʼu mʼika odudu ko
i chaka chʼo̩mo̩, o̩wo̩-we̩ ane̩ mi le,
Iche̩wñ kʼu kakini, E̩chubi abʼumi ma chuu,
i chaka chʼe̩chubi onugo i adʼe̩wñ maja ñw e̩ n,
Todu e̩wñ du ki dʼef umi uwe̩ bo̩,
Nagogbodʼe̩, todu alu kʼe̩ che mi abailo, i chʼe̩wñ aye.
Achiku-mi maja ñw e̩ n,
Eju-we̩ cheli e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ che mi e̩gba ku ma ma cho̩na-wñ ta n;
O, ibe kʼe̩ kpe̩ le̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw mi, O O̩jo̩!
Iche̩wñ kʼomi ma kʼaluka-wñ, aluka-wñ wewe tʼe̩lanyi le.
O, uwe̩ ma fʼame̩ne̩bibi kpa rinyo̩, O O̩jo̩,
todu ma nʼo̩la bibi aka nyʼe̩,
I chʼulaka abo ku ma chʼulaka we̩ oñ omi ache-i n, O Jihofa?
Ulaka-ma kʼu nache mufu kpa;
Fʼef e̩do̩-mi tu, O O̩jo̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ma ef e̩do̩-mi!
Kʼe̩ la go, abe̩k o̩na e̩do̩dudu dʼef umi,
